name: Ricky (In Browser)
description:
This is a game where your a mutant named Ricky. You and the other mutants weren't always mutants. You have to change back. When (or if) you beat the game there's a button that says story. That teaches you the story if you didn't know what happened.

NOTE: This game is very hard and mite take an hour to finish.

NOTE 2: This is the browser one. If you want a better experience then download the game. The only reason you should choose this one instead is because the other file is for windows only.
